title: Login page not responsive on mobile devices
description: The login form elements are not properly aligned on screens smaller than 768px. Input fields overlap and the submit button is partially hidden behind the footer on iPhone Safari.

activities.text: I've started investigating this issue. It appears to be related to flexbox constraints on iOS Safari.
Status changed from new to open

title: Add dark mode theme support
description: Users have requested a dark mode theme option. This should include a toggle in user preferences and proper color scheme implementation across all components.

activities.text: Assigned to Mike Rodriguez
Status changed from open to in-progress
I've completed the theme toggle component. Now working on applying the dark mode styles across all pages.

title: Database connection timeout in production
description: Random database timeouts occurring in production environment causing 500 errors. Appears to happen during peak traffic hours (9-11 AM EST).

activities.text: Priority changed from high to critical
I've increased the connection pool size and added timeout monitoring. Deploying to staging for testing.
Status changed from in-progress to review
Staging tests look good. No timeouts observed over 4 hours of load testing.

title: Implement user profile page
description: Create a comprehensive user profile page where users can update their personal information, change passwords, and manage notification preferences.

activities.text: We should include avatar upload functionality in this page as well.

title: Update API documentation
description: The API documentation is outdated and missing several new endpoints. Need to update Swagger docs and include proper examples for all endpoints.

activities.text: Assigned to Emma Thompson
Updated all endpoint documentation and added code examples for authentication flows.
Status changed from in-progress to closed

title: Search functionality returns incorrect results
description: The search feature is returning irrelevant results and not properly filtering by categories. Users report finding content that doesn't match their search terms.

activities.text: Root cause identified - the search index wasn't being updated after content modifications. Implementing fix now.

title: Add email notification system
description: Implement automated email notifications for important events like password changes, account updates, and system maintenance windows.

title: Memory leak in image upload component
description: Users report browser slowdown when uploading multiple images. Investigation shows memory usage increases significantly and doesn't get released properly.

activities.text: Found the issue - image preview URLs weren't being revoked. Implemented proper cleanup in useEffect.
Status changed from in-progress to review

title: Setup automated testing pipeline
description: Establish CI/CD pipeline with automated unit tests, integration tests, and deployment to staging environment. Should include code coverage reporting.

activities.text: Pipeline configured with GitHub Actions. Running tests on every PR now.
Added code coverage reporting. Currently at 78% coverage.
Status changed from in-progress to closed

title: Implement two-factor authentication
description: Add 2FA support using TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) for enhanced security. Should support popular authenticator apps like Google Authenticator and Authy.

activities.text: Backend TOTP generation and validation is complete. Now working on the frontend setup flow.

title: Fix pagination bug in user list
description: Pagination controls show incorrect page numbers when filtering results. The total count doesn't update properly after applying filters.

title: Create admin dashboard analytics
description: Build comprehensive analytics dashboard for administrators showing user engagement metrics, system performance, and usage statistics with interactive charts.

activities.text: Starting with user engagement metrics. Will use Chart.js for visualizations.
